content.raw:
Some preliminary comments on the integration:

1. I noticed there is always a "loading" div below the whole page, we need to remove that:

    ![loadingfuel.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/3288917851-loadingfuel.png)

1. Sometimes there is flickering on the bottom of the canvas, have you seen this?

    ![flickeringgzweb.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/3779360183-flickeringgzweb.gif)

1. Can we get rid of the button "View model in GZ3D"?

1. Can the scripts you placed on `index.html` be placed inside `gz3d.lib.js` and `sdfviewer.component.ts` instead?
content.html:
Some preliminary comments on the integration:

  1. I noticed there is always a "loading" div below the whole page, we need to remove that:

  2. Sometimes there is flickering on the bottom of the canvas, have you seen this?

  3. Can we get rid of the button "View model in GZ3D"?

  4. Can the scripts you placed on index.html be placed inside gz3d.lib.js and sdfviewer.component.ts instead?
